title: Nat Resources and Development in Nigeria

content.question: Which of the following is the best explanation of how natural resources have affected political development in Nigeria?

choices.label: Oil extraction in Nigeria has allowed the government to diversify its economy.
Oil extraction in Nigeria has allowed the government to redistribute funds to citizens, limiting economic inequality and promoting democracy.
Oil extraction in Nigeria has motivated political elites to seek government control of these resources, deepening corruption and impeding democratic consolidation.
Oil extraction in Nigeria has helped the economy and allowed the government to focus on increasing transparency.

content.answer: Oil extraction in Nigeria has motivated political elites to seek government control of these resources, deepening corruption and impeding democratic consolidation.
